original: Ekstedt, Carl Gustav, advokat, Göteborg, f. 5/9/06 i Gbg av brandche- fen Gustaf E. o. Ester Borg. G. 38 m. Sonja Penlow. Barn: Margareta f. 39, Ragnhild 41, Robert 43. — Stud:-ex. v. Gbgs latin 24, fil. kand. i Gbg 26, jur. kand. i Lund 29. Tingstjg. i Askims, Hisings o. Sävedals doms. 29-32, egen adv :verksamh. i Gbg sed. 33. Led. av Sv:es adv:s’amf. sed. 35.
translated: Ekstedt, Carl Gustav, lawyer, Gothenburg, born September 5th, 1906 in Gothenburg to fire chief Gustaf E. and Ester Borg. Married in 1938 to Sonja Penlow. Children: Margareta (born in 1939), Ragnhild (born in 1941), and Robert (born in 1943). He passed his entrance exam to Gothenburg's Latin School in 1924, received a bachelor's degree in philosophy from Gothenburg in 1926, and earned a law degree from Lund in 1929. He served as a court clerk in Askim, Hisingen and Sävedalens courts from 1929-1932, and had his own law practice in Gothenburg since 1933. He has been a member of the Swedish Bar Association since 1935.
